resources.string:
Welcome, Provider! 

 As a provider, you can view the summary reports for children, but only when a parent shares their data with you. 

 You will not be able to modify or edit any of the data shared with you. 

 Please wait for a parent to share an access code with you, and then submit it to see more information about the child.

Welcome Child! 

 As a child you can log your medicines and symptoms, practice inhaler techniques, and track your asthma in a fun, safe way! 


If you’re experiencing an asthma attack, you can use the
Rescue feature to track your symptoms and see how serious your attack is. Parents will receive an alert automatically.


The
Controller feature lets you check in daily to track your symptoms and medicine use, helping you stay on top of your asthma care.


By default, only your parent can see your information. They can view summaries, check your logs, and choose what to share with your healthcare provider.

Welcome, Parent!

 This app helps you support your child’s asthma care in a safe, easy way.

 - See your child’s logs: You can view summaries of their symptoms, medicine use, and Rescue events.
 - Manage data sharing: By default, your child’s data is private. You decide what to share with your healthcare provider. You can toggle sharing on or off at any time.
 - Stay informed: You’ll receive alerts when your child logs a Rescue, so you know if they need help.

 How it works:
 - Rescue: If your child is having an asthma attack, they can log their symptoms and see how serious it is. You’ll get an alert automatically.
 - Controller: Your child can check in daily to track symptoms and medicine use. You can view their logs to support their care.

 Your child’s privacy is protected, and you control what information is shared with healthcare providers.
Please set your personal best PEF.
Danger: Use your reliever and see a doctor.
